LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodFiredGenetronDesc: Install wood-fueled furnaces that greatly improve the power output of the genetron core, but will change the generator to require wood to operate.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodFiredGenetronDescExpanded: Install wood-fueled furnaces that greatly improve the power output of the genetron core, but will change the generator to require wood to operate.\n\nGenetron needs to operate uninterrupted for 3 days (time at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodFueledGenetronDesc: Install an automated system for feeding the fuel, keeping the furnace at optimal output with less frequent fueling.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodFueledGenetronDescExpande: Install an automated system for feeding the fuel, keeping the furnace at optimal output with less frequent fueling.\n\nGenetron needs to burn 700 fuel (fuel burned at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodPoweredGenetronDesc: Install energy circulators that redirect excess heat back into the genetron core, amplifying power output with only a slight rise in fuel consumption.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodPoweredGenetronDescExpand: Install energy circulators that redirect excess heat back into the genetron core, amplifying power output with only a slight rise in fuel consumption.\n\nGenetron needs to burn 1500 fuel (fuel burned at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodBlastingGenetronDesc: Install large, adjustable internal cylinders that allow altering the burn rate of the core, adjusting the power generated to fit the needs of the colony.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodBlastingGenetronDescExpan: Install large, adjustable internal cylinders that allow altering the burn rate of the core, adjusting the power generated to fit the needs of the colony.\n\nGenetron needs to operate uninterrupted for 30 days (time at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelPoweredGenetronDesc: Install a set of chemfuel-operated engines that power up the genetron core, providing large quantities of energy by burning chemfuel. The engines will need regular maintenance, and if they break down, will require genetron components to be replaced.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelPoweredGenetronDescEx: Install a set of chemfuel-operated engines that power up the genetron core, providing large quantities of energy by burning chemfuel. The engines will need regular maintenance, and if they break down, will require genetron components to be replaced.\n\nGenetron needs to operate at 200% using genetron tuning uninterrupted for 12 days. (time at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelBoostedGenetronDesc: Install a hyperburn chamber to superheat the combustion process and extract maximum energy from each unit of fuel.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelBoostedGenetronDescEx: Install a hyperburn chamber to superheat the combustion process and extract maximum energy from each unit of fuel.\n\nGenetron overdrive needs to be active for 5 days. (time at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelChargedGenetronDesc: Install an adaptive fuel modulator to adjust fuel flow dynamically, matching power demands and optimizing fuel usage. This ensures extended runtime and peak efficiency without sacrificing energy output.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelChargedGenetronDescEx: Install an adaptive fuel modulator to adjust fuel flow dynamically, matching power demands and optimizing fuel usage. This ensures extended runtime and peak efficiency without sacrificing energy output.\n\nPower surge needs to be activated 3 times. (activations at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_GenetronOverdriveDesc: Put the genetron in a temporary 5 day overdrive mode. It will rapidly burn through fuel, generating significantly more energy. If at any point during the overdrive the fuel runs out, the generator will break down and require refurbishing with genetron components.
LanguageData.VQE_GenetronOverdriveDescExtended: Put the genetron in a temporary 5 day overdrive mode. It will rapidly burn through fuel, generating significantly more energy. If at any point during the overdrive the fuel runs out, the generator will break down and require refurbishing with genetron components.\n\nThe Overdrive has a 30 day cooldown. It will be ready again in {0}
LanguageData.VQE_GenetronTuningDesc: Alter the fuel consumption to increase or decrease the power generated by the genetron.
LanguageData.VQE_GenetronFineTuningDesc: Alter the fuel consumption to increase or decrease the power generated by the genetron, and adjust generator maintenance wear to boost the power output.
LanguageData.VQE_PowerSurgeDesc: Instantly vaporize half of the remaining fuel in the genetron to create a surge of power, refilling the batteries at the cost of a significant 25% maintenance reduction of the genetron. Power surge will temporarily disable nearby electronics.
LanguageData.VQE_PowerSurgeDescExtended: nstantly vaporize half of the remaining fuel in the genetron to create a surge of power, refilling the batteries at the cost of a significant 25% maintenance reduction of the genetron. Power surge will temporarily disable nearby electronics.\n\nPower Surge has a 15 day cooldown. It will be ready again in {0}
LanguageData.VQE_PowerSurgeDescNoMaintenance: Power surge cannot be activated: Genetron maintenance is too low (below 30%).
LanguageData.VQE_NeedsStudy: {0} did not study an ancient genetron.
LanguageData.VQE_NeedsStudyGeneric: This colonist can't repair critical breakdowns, as they did not study an ancient genetron
LanguageData.VQE_Alert_LowMaintenance_Desc: Genetron requires maintenance. If no maintenance is performed, the genetron will critically break down.
LanguageData.VQE_Alert_CriticalMaintenance_Desc: Genetron requires urgent maintenance. If no maintenance is performed, the genetron will critically break down.
